section.p: You can call this method to change the currently used audio route, but it does not change the default audio route. For example, if the default audio route is speaker 1, and you call this method before joining a channel to set the audio route to speaker 2 and start the device test, the SDK performs the device test on speaker 2. After the device test is completed and you join the channel, the SDK still uses the default audio route speaker 1.
section.note: This method is only applicable to Windows and macOS platforms.
